cause.description:
The food that you have wasted or the clothing you have thrown out could all go to a poor man, woman, or even child who works 18 hours days just to get a small piece of bread. My mother was once one of those children and it took much work , heartache, and courage for her to get to where she is right now. Help someone in need. Just by joining you are making a difference.
1. Poverty in Brazil must end immediately.
2. Put yourself in their shoes.
3. No one should be left without food, shelter, and clothing.
cause.name: Help the Poor in Brazil
